c1.name: The Scent Remained
c1.effect: Increases the maximum number of Rain Swords by 1.

c2.name: Rainbow Upon the Azure Sky
c2.effect:
Extends the duration of Guhua Sword: Raincutter by 3s.
Decreases the Hydro RES of enemies hit by sword rain attacks by 15% for 4s.

c3.name: Weaver of Verses
c3.effect: Increases the Level of Guhua Sword: Raincutter by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Evilsoother
c4.effect: Throughout the duration of Guhua Sword: Raincutter, the DMG dealt by Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen is increased by 50%.

c5.name: Embrace of Rain
c5.effect: Increases the Level of Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Hence, Call Them My Own Verses
c6.effect: Activating 2 of Guhua Sword: Raincutter's sword rain attacks greatly increases the DMG of the third. Xingqiu regenerates 3 Energy when sword rain attacks hit enemies.
